content.prompt: The argument in the excerpt overlooks which of the following broader historical contexts that best explains why some immigrants came to the United States during the late twentieth century?

choices.label: Cold War tensions resulted in efforts to attract immigrant workers in defense industries.
The need for unskilled immigrant labor increased as agricultural production mechanized.
Businesses exerted continued demand for labor supplied by immigrants.
Immigrants were attracted by the lower taxes enacted by the Reagan administration.

topic.text: 9.5: Migration and Immigration in the 1990s and 2000s
